snippet: Chancellor Dennis M. Walcott outlined contingency plans as a union leader urged negotiations on job security, the main issue.
abstract: New York City Schools Chancellor Dennis M Walcott details contingency plans for 152,000 public and private students who could be affected by possible strike by city's school bus drivers.
lead_paragraph: Chancellor Dennis M. Walcott outlined contingency plans as a union leader urged negotiations on job security, the main issue.

headline.seo: N.Y.C. Plans for Possible School Bus Drivers’ Strike
headline.main: City Prepares for a Strike, Maybe This Week, by School Bus Drivers
headline.print_headline: City Prepares for a Strike, Maybe This Week, by School Bus Drivers
